mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DATAGEAR_HTML_CHART_WIDGET ( HCW_ID, HCW_NAME, HCW_PLUGIN_ID, HCW_UPDATE_INTERVAL, HCW_CREATE_USER_ID, HCW_CREATE_TIME, HCW_AP_ID, HCW_RD_FORMAT, HCW_ATTR_VALUES, HCW_OPTIONS ) VALUES ( #{entity.id}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.pluginVo.id}, #{entity.updateInterval}, #{entity.createUser.id}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.analysisProject.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.resultDataFormat, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.attrValuesJson, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.options, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO DATAGEAR_HCW_DS ( HCW_ID, DS_ID, DS_PROPERTY_SIGNS, DS_ALIAS, DS_ATTACHMENT, DS_QUERY, DS_PROPERTY_ALIASES, DS_PROPERTY_ORDERS, DS_ORDER, DS_DATASET_SIGNS ) VALUES ( #{entity.widgetId}, #{entity.dataSetId}, #{entity.fieldSignsJson, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.alias, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.attachment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.queryJson, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.fieldAliasesJson, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.fieldOrdersJson, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.order}, #{entity.dataSetSignsJson, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE DATAGEAR_HTML_CHART_WIDGET SET HCW_NAME = #{entity.name}, HCW_PLUGIN_ID = #{entity.pluginVo.id}, HCW_UPDATE_INTERVAL = #{entity.updateInterval}, HCW_AP_ID = #{entity.analysisProject.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HCW_RD_FORMAT = #{entity.resultDataFormat, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HCW_ATTR_VALUES = #{entity.attrValuesJson, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HCW_OPTIONS = #{entity.options, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE HCW_ID = #{entity.id}
mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM () T WHERE T.${_iq_}id${_iq_} = #{id}

SELECT HCW_ID AS ${_iq_}widgetId${_iq_}, DS_ID AS ${_iq_}dataSetId${_iq_}, DS_PROPERTY_SIGNS AS ${_iq_}fieldSignsJson${_iq_}, DS_ALIAS AS ${_iq_}alias${_iq_}, DS_ATTACHMENT AS ${_iq_}attachment${_iq_}, DS_QUERY AS ${_iq_}queryJson${_iq_}, DS_PROPERTY_ALIASES AS ${_iq_}fieldAliasesJson${_iq_}, DS_PROPERTY_ORDERS AS ${_iq_}fieldOrdersJson${_iq_}, DS_ORDER AS ${_iq_}order${_iq_}, DS_DATASET_SIGNS AS ${_iq_}dataSetSignsJson${_iq_} FROM DATAGEAR_HCW_DS WHERE HCW_ID = #{widgetId}
SELECT T.DATA_ID as ${_iq_}dataId${_iq_}, T.DATA_PERMISSION as ${_iq_}dataPermission${_iq_} FROM () T WHERE T.DATA_ID = #{item}

choose.otherwise: SELECT T0.*, T1.DATA_PERMISSION as ${_iq_}dataPermission${_iq_} FROM () T0 INNER JOIN () T1 ON T0.${_iq_}id${_iq_} = T1.DATA_ID WHERE T1.DATA_PERMISSION IS NOT NULL AND T1.DATA_PERMISSION >= ${DP_MIN_READ_PERMISSION}

mapper.sql: SELECT A.HCW_ID AS DP_AUTH_DATA_ID, A.HCW_CREATE_USER_ID AS DP_AUTH_DATA_CREATOR_ID FROM DATAGEAR_HTML_CHART_WIDGET A

SELECT A.HCW_ID AS ${_iq_}id${_iq_}, A.HCW_NAME AS ${_iq_}name${_iq_}, A.HCW_PLUGIN_ID AS ${_iq_}pluginVo.id${_iq_}, A.HCW_PLUGIN_ID AS ${_iq_}chartPluginName${_iq_},/*默认设置为插件ID，避免页面排序报错*/ A.HCW_UPDATE_INTERVAL AS ${_iq_}updateInterval${_iq_}, A.HCW_CREATE_USER_ID AS ${_iq_}createUser.id${_iq_}, , A.HCW_CREATE_TIME AS ${_iq_}createTime${_iq_}, A.HCW_RD_FORMAT AS ${_iq_}resultDataFormat${_iq_}, A.HCW_ATTR_VALUES AS ${_iq_}attrValuesJson${_iq_}, A.HCW_OPTIONS AS ${_iq_}options${_iq_}, AP.* FROM DATAGEAR_HTML_CHART_WIDGET A LEFT JOIN DATAGEAR_USER USR ON A.HCW_CREATE_USER_ID = USR.USER_ID LEFT JOIN () AP ON A.HCW_AP_ID = AP.${_iq_}analysisProject.id${_iq_}
